title.rendered: Fully Funded Scholarships for Developing Countries in Australia 2024 | Austrian Development Cooperation

content.rendered:
The Austrian Development Cooperation ADC as a team with Tourism School Salzburg Institute of Tourism & Hotel Management invites applications from reasonably qualified students for Austrian Development Cooperation Scholarships for Non-industrial Nations 2024 (Fully funded).

Consistently the Austrian Development Cooperation offers students from emerging nations scholarships to assist with educational expenses and general costs.

Austrian Development Cooperation Scholarship Summary

Scholarship Sponsor(s): Austrian Development Cooperation

Host Institution(s): Institute of Tourism & Hotel Management, Austria

Scholarship Worth: Fully-Funded

Number of Awards: Several

Study Level: Bachelor & Masters Degree

Nationality: International Students (Developing Countries)

Austrian Development Cooperation Scholarships | DETAILS

The Austrian Development Cooperation offers Two Types of Scholarships:

  • Scholarship for ADC’s priority countries
  • Scholarship for other developing countries 

Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible for Austrian Development Cooperation Scholarships, applicants are expected to meet the following conditions:

  • Applicants must be international students from developing countries
  • Applicants must be ready to study in Institute of Tourism & Hotel Management, Salzburg, Austria
  • Applicants must enrol in full-time program
  • Applicants must have proof of English Language proficiency

Application Procedures

How-to-Apply: To be considered for Austrian Development Cooperation Scholarships for Developing Countries 2024 (Fully funded), applicants should apply online by:

  • Fill out the application form properly and legibly.
  • Make sure you supply all the required information and attach the entire required documents.
  • Send translated English or German documents if required.
  • Include a working e-mail address, phone and fax numbers as your application might be abandoned if your e-mail address, phone and fax number are not good.
  • Apply early. Late applications will not be processed.

Application Deadline: March 31, 2024

You can read full details of the scholarships by visiting the school’s website
